text:
I think my life's
purpose isn't fixed

and I think that's probably
the case for a lot of people.

I think it is actually really
wonderful for a purpose

to change and evolve over time
and with different contexts.

So I would say that right
now my purpose is really

to survive this pandemic,
which has obviously

been extremely difficult for so
many people across the world.

As I think more broadly
and into my future,

And so I view my purpose
in life as really enabling

whether it's coming from
a writer, a filmmaker,

a musician, a photographer, a
teacher, whoever it might be,

I really want to
break down whatever

barriers they've
had to face in order

to have their voices and their
stories told in the world.
